metadata.feature_description: Create and edit rich HTML content using a WYSIWYG editor with inline editing capabilities

steps.action: Navigate to Home page and enter Edit mode
steps.expected: Page enters edit mode with module controls visible
steps.actual: Edit mode activated successfully with pane labels and module action bars visible

steps.action: Locate an HTML module and click on content area
steps.actual: Inline editor with Redactor toolbar appeared with formatting options (Bold, Italic, Link, Lists, etc.)

steps.action: Type new content in the editor
steps.actual: Content 'Test HTML Content - Created via Inline Editor' was entered successfully

steps.action: Click on existing HTML module content in edit mode
steps.expected: Inline editor activates with existing content
steps.actual: Inline editor activated showing existing content with editing toolbar

steps.expected: Content can be modified in place
steps.actual: Content was modified successfully using inline editing

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Edit content in separate edit page (Advanced Editor)

steps.action: Click expand/edit button in inline editor toolbar
steps.actual: CKEditor dialog opened in a modal popup with full WYSIWYG capabilities

steps.expected: Content can be entered in CKEditor
steps.actual: Content was entered successfully in the CKEditor text area

steps.expected: Dialog closes and content is saved
steps.actual: Dialog closed and page returned to edit mode
Text was selected in the editor
Bold formatting was applied successfully - text wrapped in <strong> tags

steps.action: Verify bold formatting persists after save
steps.expected: Bold text visible in saved content
steps.actual: Bold formatting persisted - verified in edit mode showing strong tag around content

steps.action: Enter content in editor and navigate away or refresh
steps.expected: Content is auto-saved or saved on close
steps.actual: Content was saved via autosave mechanism (5 second interval) and persisted after page navigation

steps.action: Re-enter edit mode and verify content
steps.actual: Content 'Test HTML Content - Created via Inline Editor' with bold formatting was visible in module 468

steps.action: Make changes to content in edit mode
steps.actual: Changes were made and draft indicator [DRAFT TEST] appeared on page
Confirmation dialog appeared asking 'Are you sure you want to discard the changes?'

steps.expected: Changes are reverted to last published state
steps.actual: Error dialog appeared: 'Another user has taken action on the page and its state has been changed. Please, refresh the page to see the current state.' - API call to /API/EvoqContentLibrary/Publishing/DiscardTab failed with server error

issues: Discard API (/API/EvoqContentLibrary/Publishing/DiscardTab) fails with server error causing page state conflict message

steps.action: Click on 'Click to add text' button in empty pane
steps.expected: New HTML module is created with inline editor
steps.actual: JavaScript TypeError occurred: 'Cannot read properties of undefined' in ModuleDialog.js - feature did not activate

issues: Quick Add Text feature throws TypeError in ModuleDialog.js:1025:30 when clicking 'Click to add text' handler

observations: The inline editing feature works well with Redactor editor providing formatting options
Advanced Editor uses CKEditor with full WYSIWYG capabilities
Autosave functionality is enabled with 5 second interval (TIME_TO_AUTOSAVE = 5000 in code)
Content versioning creates draft states visible with [DRAFT TEST] indicator
The Discard API has issues that cause page state conflicts - likely race condition or state management bug
The 'Click to add text' Quick Add feature has a JavaScript error preventing it from working
EditHtml.ascx page loaded blank when accessed directly - designed for popup mode only
PersonaBar iframe occasionally intercepts clicks requiring JavaScript workarounds
